Articles.Content: I noticed a mod conflict while playing. several of the vanilla expandable solar panels would not work I could place them, but they would not work. couldn't right-click on them or bring them up in the action key section. I don't know who the original mod author is for kopernicus, but if they could look into fixing this bug i'd appreciate it. since there are one or two mods that require kopernicus to work.
I would go to the thread for that mod and report that there....

Welcome to the forum

DId you install the 'ModularFlightIntegrator' as well? It is bundlend with Kopernicus and your descriptions sounds exactly like you missed it.
